description: Fr. Mike explains how the bronze serpent is a prefiguration of Jesus on the Cross.  We also continue to learn how God's laws in Deuteronomy redefine the social and sexual norms for the Israelites to teach them about the dignity of every human person. Today's readings are Numbers 21, Deuteronomy 22, and Psalm 102. For the complete reading plan, visit ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear. Please note: The Bible contains adult themes that may not be suitable for children - parental discretion is advised.
html_description:
Fr. Mike explains how the bronze serpent is a prefiguration of Jesus on the Cross. We also continue to learn how God's laws in Deuteronomy redefine the social and sexual norms for the Israelites to teach them about the dignity of every human person. Today's readings are Numbers 21, Deuteronomy 22, and Psalm 102.


For the complete reading plan, visit ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear.

Support The Bible in a Year (with Fr. Mike Schmitz)
name: Day 69: The Bronze Serpent (2022)
